- 找路环节极多，很烦

Portal 2 is personally one of the best games i have played and recommend it for its story and graphics
Fun Story Mode, Really Fun Co-op mode best played with Friends and Family Members. A MUST GET GAME FOR THOSE NEW TO PC

Simplemente... Exquisito. Ese final épico que demostró muy buena campaña y su modo cooperativo es genialmente aceptable y muy brutal a la hora de jugar con tus amigos y con los nuevos amigos random que te encontras en linea. 10/10 uwu
the best game I have played, besides Portal 1. this game is perfection.

Imagino que todos já saibam sobre Portal 2 no presente momento, porem quem gosta de puzzles e de pensar bastante é o jogo certo, assim como a maioria dos jogos puzzles ele tem diversos elementos que são adicionados ao decorrer da jogatina alem de ter uma historia interessante . Recomendo o jogo, dou uma nota 8,5/10 ( provavelmente a nota seria maior se eu não fosse burro )
Just as great as I remember it on the PS3.
Literally the best game ever. Nothing more.

Un gran juego. Lo compré de oferta porque quería probarlo por su tendencia sin esperar mucho de él, pero la verdad que me ha sorprendido. Su historia es bastante emocionante y los recursos del juego están muy bien implementados.

Muy buen juego , entretenido como el primero. Es corto, pero vale la pena jugarlo
Yo this game is poggers, portals are cool. Humor is cool. Teaming up with- Actually nevermind that's gonna spoil it..

Can't complain about more Portal.
Also includes easy access to awesome custom levels made by the community.
Haven't played the co-op though.

Плюсы:
Интересные головоломки.
Веселый юмор на протяжении игры.
Возможность играть как одному так и вдвоем вдвоем.

Минусы: 
Дискриминация роботов 
Часто возникает желание открыть портал в окно.

Improved from the first game in every way: puzzles expanded on, story has way more depth and the game was longer while still feeling the right length. Overall a really good game that challenges your thinking. Co-op is fun and provides some nice extra plot.

Интересная игра с хорошим сюжетом, крутым геймплеем и офигенным саундтреком! Также валв не обделили игру смешным и черноватым юмором. А если хочется поиграть с друзьями, то есть КО-ОП режим с таким же юморком от ГЛаДОС, более сложными тестами и даже каким-то сюжетом! (Правда я не знаю, каким). Короче, рекомендую к покупке

Игра заметно улучшилась по сравнению с первой частью
Графика прекрасна, даже в наши дни имхо, сюжет стал в разы интереснее, а головоломки так же затягивают
Но в моём сердечке останется первая часть

Guwno jebane, nie dzial zacina sie kurwa probojesz grac to chuj jakis ziemniak, japierdole.!111 Trzeba myslec hcuj wie ile zeby pszejsc jeden chociasz poziom f tej pierdolonej grze relaksowac sie nie morzesz jak ci mowi jakas baba polonistka ic tu ic tam 0/10 chujowe pzdr

I've finally had chance to play and finish the famous Portal 2, they improved the game so much if we compare it to the previous one.  All the visuals and sound design was better. They clearly added a lot more levels in single player, it was quite long to finish. Also I want to say that level design is very clever and creative. They also added new mechanics to the game which made it more unique in my opinion. The fact that they added multiplayer mode and allowed community to create their own maps is also a plus. As for the story, it wasn't that amazing for me to be honest, but the other aspects of the game were very well done.
Es ist einfach ein tolles Spiel so wohl im Solo als auch im Koop spiel ich habe selten ein so gutes Spiel gespielt

Las pruebas son sumamente ingeiosas
la historia es uno de sus puntos fuertes
pero mi cosa favorita sin lugar a dudas son los personajes secundarios
que maravilla de juego
